segments.text: I observe the woman standing by the sink, absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes while the water overflows behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it could make someone slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the children on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up expectantly, her arm raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry they'll fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a peaceful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the inside feel even more out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene just tugs at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR
